text: "The CDC is taking this threat seriously and it has been working closely with Puerto Rico. But I want to be sure that we are truly doing all we can to fight the Zika virus from spreading. Thats why Im sending two of my Senior Advisors to travel to Puerto Rico on a fact-findingxa0mission to learn more about how Zika isxa0impacting the island and to determine what more we can do to assist Puerto Rico in responding to this health crisis. Zika is an urgent problem and we need to act now."
